name: ImageJ threshold shanbhag
title: ImageJ threshold shanbhag
description: Implements Shanbhag's extension of Kapur's Renyi Entropy method.
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov), Anjali Taneja, Benjamin Houghton (benjamin.houghton@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health
citation: Shanbhag, A. G. (1994). Utilization of Information Measure as a Means of Image Thresholding. CVGIP: Graphical Models and Image Processing, 56(5), 414-419. doi:10.1006/cgip.1994.1037
